aqi.title: Air Quality Index
aqi.good: Air quality is good. Enjoy outdoor activities.
aqi.moderate: Air quality is acceptable. Sensitive individuals should consider reducing prolonged outdoor exertion.
aqi.unhealthySensitive: Sensitive groups should reduce prolonged outdoor exertion. Everyone else can continue normal activities.
aqi.unhealthy: Everyone should reduce prolonged outdoor exertion. Sensitive groups should avoid outdoor activities.
aqi.veryUnhealthy: Everyone should avoid prolonged outdoor exertion. Sensitive groups should remain indoors.
aqi.hazardous: Everyone should avoid all outdoor activities. Stay indoors with windows closed.
